article.title: OMG THIS IS THE HOTTEST ARTICLE
article.author: Joe Pohoryles

article.title: Pastrnak scores hat trick, Bruins top Avalanche to push point streak to 7
article.content: David Pastrnak scored a hat trick, and the Boston Bruins extended their point streak to seven games with a 5-2 win against the Colorado Avalanche at TD Garden on Thursday.
article.author: Joe Pohoryles
